ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Return the current units setting for a PHA data set

DESC.PARA: The function get_analysis() returns the units which are being used in the analysis of a Sherpa PHA dataset, by data set ID. The possible return values are channel, wavelength, and energy:
The units of a data set may be changed with set_analysis().

LIST.ITEM: id - the id of the dataset to use; if not given, uses the default dataset id (id=1 by default, see "ahelp get_default_id")

DESC.PARA: When get_analysis() is called with no arguments, a string identifying the units setting of the default dataset is returned.
Here, a string identifying the units setting of data set 3 is returned.
The string identifying the units used in the analysis of a data set with string ID "SgrA" is returned.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
